item.title: Aspose.Slides for Java 24.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes forÂ Aspose.Slides for Java 24.1 Key Summary Category Related Documentation SLIDESNET-44348 4.5 MB ODP file after conversion to PDF becomes 500+ MB Enhancement https://docs.aspose.com/slides/net/convert-powerpoint-to-pdf/ SLIDESNET-43561 Embedded fonts render incorrectly in Linux Enhancement https://docs.aspose.com/slides/net/convert-powerpoint-to-jpg/ SLIDESNET-43871 Individual text boxes are generated when importing PDF to PPTX Enhancement SLIDESJAVA-39028 Use Aspose.Slides for Net 24.
